overview: This is an Australian-made parody of Italian action–adventure films of the 60s and 70s. and foreign movies that misappropriated popular American superheroes such as the Japanese TV series “Spider-Man”. (It should be noted that the Japanese Spider-Man was officially sanctioned by Marvel and is considered canon in the Marvel universe) This is an Italian take on the comic book superhero Spider-Man.
title: Italian Spiderman
